primary.name: Strength
primary.description: Adds to raw power. Each point increases both base damage and the chance to gain bonus XP.

effects.name: Base Damage
effects.description: Damage dealt to skulls before matching any swords.

effects.name: Bonus XP chance
effects.description: Chance of gaining extra XP for each skull beyond the first three matched in a turn.

primary.name: Dexterity
primary.description: Improves defensive responses when matching shields.

effects.name: Defense per shield
effects.description: Defense restored from a single shield tile.

effects.name: Bonus shield chance
effects.description: Chance of generating extra shields for each tile after the third in the same match.

primary.name: Vitality
primary.description: Boosts health pool and potion match bonuses.

effects.name: Max health
effects.description: Total health the player can have.

effects.name: Bonus potion chance
effects.description: Chance to receive extra potions for each additional potion beyond three matched in a turn.

primary.name: Luck
primary.description: Determines the effectiveness of potions and bonus coins.

effects.name: Health per potion
effects.description: Amount of health restored per potion tile.

effects.name: Bonus coin chance
effects.description: Chance to generate extra coins for each coin beyond the first three matched.

combat.name: Armor piercing
combat.description: Chance that sword damage bypasses skull armor.

combat.name: Defense
combat.description: Flat damage reduction applied before health is affected.

combat.name: Armor durability
combat.description: Chance that armor absorbing damage does not reduce defense.
